Text: Can a woman be an "Uncle Tom"?
@zakimar, well considering you already call your mother Uncle Bob, I can't see any harm in you calling her Uncle Tom.

although i generally disregard most of what 'zakimar' says as being really simple or inappropriate, he actually stumped me with this one and i had to google: "uncle tom." heh... although still inappropriate, he does gets some points for introducing me to a new slur.

other than that... any comments or opinions on the content?
